author: wdownes
title: Victor Lindelof still expected to join Manchester United despite Phil Jones and Marcos Rojo form with Benfica waiting for big-money bid
text:
EFL LINDELOF OR ON? Victor Lindelof still expected to join Manchester United despite Phil Jones and Marcos Rojo form with Benfica waiting for big-money bid 
Portuguese league leaders had United over a barrel earlier in the season when a Â£42million move looked likely but United have drastically improved by WALLY DOWNES JR
